Package voltage.controllers

Class ADSREnvelope

java.lang.Object
voltage.controllers.ADSREnvelope
public class ADSREnvelope
extends java.lang.Object
A traditional attack, decay, sustain, release envelope.

  • Field Details

    • MIN_TIME

      public final double MIN_TIME
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • ADSREnvelope

      public ADSREnvelope()

  • Method Details

    • SetFastAttack

      public void SetFastAttack​(boolean bFastAttack)
      Sets the attack curve.
      Parameters:
      bFastAttack - set to true for a fast attack curve. Fast attack uses an exponential curve that jumps up quickly. The default curve or slow curve stays low and then jumps up at the end.

    • SetAttackTime

      public void SetAttackTime​(double attackTime)
      Set the amount of time for the envelope to ramp up to the decay level.
      Parameters:
      attackTime - time in milliseconds. Must be greater than 0 milliseconds.

    • SetAttackHoldTime

      public void SetAttackHoldTime​(double attackHoldTime)
      Set the amount of time to stay at 100% level.
      Parameters:
      attackHoldTime - milliseconds.

    • SetDecayTime

      public void SetDecayTime​(double decayTime)
      Set the amount of time to decay from attack hold (100% level) to the sustain level.
      Parameters:
      decayTime - milliseconds.

    • SetSustainLevel

      public void SetSustainLevel​(double sustainLevel)
      Sets the sustain level.
      Parameters:
      sustainLevel - valid ranges are from 0.0 to 5.0

    • SetReleaseTime

      public void SetReleaseTime​(double releaseTime)
      Set the amount of time for the release stage.
      Parameters:
      releaseTime - milliseconds.

    • SetGate

      public void SetGate​(boolean gate)
      Trigger the gate to start the envelope
      Parameters:
      gate - set to true to start the envelope.

    • GetValue

      public double GetValue()
      Gets the envelope's current value.
      Returns:
      the value of the envelope. ( 0 to 1.0 )

    • AdvanceSample

      public void AdvanceSample()
      Makes the envelope process a single sample. Call this *once* per ProcessSample() function.
      See Also:
      VoltageModule.ProcessSample()

    • GetStage

      public ADSREnvelope.ENV_STAGE GetStage()
      Get the stage of the envelope.
      Returns:
      the current stage.

    • Reset

      public void Reset()
      Resets the envelope. This resets the output to 0 and the stage back to Off.
